item.title: A Bid to Undo a Colonial-Era Wrong Touches a People’s Old Wounds
item.description: An Oxford museum’s collection of objects taken from the Naga people includes human remains. What to do with them now is not a simple matter.

item.title: Photos From a Gaza Airdrop
item.description: A photographer accompanied a Jordanian aircrew as it dropped aid to Gaza, where starvation is rising.
